original_title: ずっと好きだった幼馴染で念願の童貞喪失で朝まで無制限発射！幼馴染の20歳の誕生日。大人になったボクらは2人でお酒を飲むが酔ったせいか本音で…
overview: Childhood friend's 20th birthday. As adults, we drink together. Maybe it's because I got drunk with alcohol that I'm not used to, but I honestly say that I've always liked him since I was little. Is it bad for a moment? I thought, but my childhood friend accepted me... However, I'm a virgin and don't know what to do, so my childhood friend kindly led me and we succeeded in uniting! And I've got the hang of it, and I shoot unlimited shots over and over again! By the time I realized it, I was sitting there until it was already bright outside.
tagline: Now That We’re Adults We Can Go Out And Party Together, But Another Intention Gets Revealed From There…
title: Old Friend That I Used To Like Gives Into My Wish To Lose My Virginity As A Cherry Boy As I Get As Much Cum Out As I Want Till Morning! It’s The 20th Birthday Of My Longtime Friend.
